page.title: 07CHAPEL FARM,HEIGHTINGTON
page.content: Chapel Farm is next to St Giles Chapel. They have 195 acres.500 feet above sea level.The history known about the farm has been passed down through generations.Mr.Pratt has 650 sheep and some mixed arable land.He has lived at Chapel Farm for 58 years and has 3 tractors,1farm truck and 1 car. As a young man Mr.Pratt was interested in farming because he was born on one.At Heightington the people have changed and the farms have been extended. Mr.Pratt likes the area very much indeed. Heightington has no school so Mr.Pratt went to Astley Cross,then he moved up to King Charles Grammar. They have a holiday once a year.
